## ColorHSV.equalValue() method

Determines if a color is equal to another

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rhs | [ColorHSV](./fast-colors.colorhsv.md) | the value to compare |
